QuestData.Title: Establish Your Garrison
QuestData.Description: It's time for the main event! We've got the materials, we've got the manpower, we've got another thing that starts with "m."$b$bLet's build this thing!$b$bI got a gaggle of assistants up on that ridge to the west.$b$bThey should have your personal surveying stand set up by now.$b$bHead on over there and you should be able to watch our progress from it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Watch the construction of your garrison by using the Master Surveyor
QuestData.RewardText: Right! I think we've got this well in hand now. And hardly an explosion to be found!

Objectives.Objective: Use the Master Surveyor to watch your Garrison be constructed
